title: Account Transfer is down?
body:
Hi,

Is anyone else having issues transferring account between servers?
I managed to transfer it on February of last year but that option isn't available to me right now.

Thanks!

replies.body:
OCE transfers have been a bit of a minefield for the last two years, but currently it's the scheduled downtime (happens every year) for the close of the ranked season.

I believe they are meant to go back up sometime in mid-preseason or at start of the new season but last year there were significant delays to that and it's not necessarily unlikely for that to happen again.
